

Box Toon Characters Pack - Humans


Hello

First of all thank you for purchasing this asset. Hoping this asset will bring value to your wonderful Product. 

This Asset contains 21 different square ( 512-512 ) Cute nicely illustrated characters to be used in your 2D Mobile Game.

Each Character has 6 Facial expressions
Generic, Smile, Angry, Sleeping, Sad, Smirk.

So in total we have 6*21 So total of 126 illustrated Faces.

& The Faces are 
Mr Afro, Mr Baldy, The Clown, Cop, Fight fighter, Purple Hat Boy, Red Hat Boy, Generic Long hair Dude, Pirate, Rapper, Blond Dude, Green Haired Dude, Purple Haired Dude, Punk, Guy with Eye patch, Red Indian, Solider, thief, wrestler Green, Wrestler Orange.

The Asset also contains Source File ( Adobe Illustrator Version CC 2015 + ) which can be used to Create more Variations and expressions. 


The Asset contains Two demo scenes and the animation folder is part of Demo Scene as well. if you dont need it then delete it, it wont effect anything.
